Package org.opends.quicksetup.util

Class PlainTextProgressMessageFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.quicksetup.util.PlainTextProgressMessageFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProgressMessageFormatter
    public class PlainTextProgressMessageFormatter
extends Object
implements ProgressMessageFormatter
    This is an implementation of the ProgressMessageFormatter class that provides format in plain text.
